workExperience.title: Senior Fullstack Developer
responsibilities: Architected and deployed 12+ Laravel APIs and Next.js applications, supporting 3M+ monthly active users with 99.9% uptime
Led migration from legacy PHP monolith to modern Laravel microservices with Next.js frontend, reducing page load time by 45% and improving SEO performance by 60%
Built real-time notification system using Laravel Broadcasting, Redis, and WebSockets, processing 500K+ events per hour with sub-100ms latency
Mentored team of 5 junior developers, establishing Laravel best practices and improving test coverage from 45% to 92% using PHPUnit and Pest
Implemented comprehensive CI/CD pipeline using GitHub Actions and Laravel Forge, reducing deployment time from 2 hours to 15 minutes

workExperience.title: Fullstack Developer
responsibilities: Developed customer-facing analytics dashboard using Next.js, React, and Laravel API, serving 150K+ users across 40 countries
Optimized MySQL database queries and implemented Laravel Query caching strategies, reducing API response time by 70%
Built automated testing framework using PHPUnit, Pest, and Cypress, achieving 85% code coverage and reducing production bugs by 40%
Collaborated with UX team to redesign core application interface using Next.js Server Components, increasing user engagement metrics by 35%
Integrated third-party payment processing using Laravel Cashier (Stripe) and PayPal APIs, handling $2M+ in monthly transactions

workExperience.title: Junior Web Developer
responsibilities: Developed and maintained responsive web applications using React and Laravel for 15+ client projects
Implemented RESTful APIs using Laravel API Resources and Eloquent ORM, supporting mobile and web applications with 50K+ daily requests
Collaborated with cross-functional teams using Agile methodologies, participating in daily standups and sprint planning
Created reusable React component library with Tailwind CSS, reducing development time for new features by 30%

projects.name: DevCollab - Real-time Collaboration Platform
projects.techStack: Next.js, TypeScript, Laravel, Laravel Broadcasting, Redis, MySQL, Docker
projects.description: Built a real-time collaborative coding platform with live cursor tracking, video chat, and code execution. Supports 10K+ concurrent connections with optimized Laravel WebSocket architecture. Featured on Product Hunt with 500+ upvotes.

projects.name: OpenAPI Monitor - API Health Dashboard
projects.techStack: React, Laravel, MySQL, Redis, Laravel Queue, AWS Lambda, Vercel
projects.description: Developed an open-source API monitoring solution with automated health checks, alert notifications, and performance analytics using Laravel Queue system. Used by 200+ companies to monitor 5,000+ endpoints.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
education.details: GPA: 3.8/4.0 | Relevant Coursework: Data Structures, Web Development, Database Systems, Software Engineering
